Text:
to install properly 

1)uninstall any previous version of idm
2)then go to start menu type 'regedit' in search box,it will open registry edit
3)go to HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE and delete registry of idm
4)disconnect internet while installing
5)then install this and apply patch
done

It's really usable for me thx for sharing.....
